about_the_game:
30th Aniversary Special Pack

To celebrate Xuan-Yuan Sword’s 30th anniversary, now a Special Pack is Free to download! This pack can change the appearance of your weapon.

30th Aniversary Special Pack includes：
Weapon Appearances：
  • Sealed Sword---Taishi Zhao
  • World-Shaking Gloves---Taishi Xiang
  • Xuan-Yuan Cleaver---Chu Hong

  • Sealed Sword
  • A peculiar sword holds mysterious and great power. One can fail to grasp its true strength even with master swordsmanship.

  • World-Shaking Gloves
  • A relic left by a mohist. One can obtain unlimited strength while wearing it and shake the world with one strike.

  • Xuan-Yuan Cleaver
  • It is said that these to cleavers are used when the Yellow Emperor cook by himself. Long for meat and short for vegetables.
  • You can equip weapons with the Appearance column, to change the appearances of your weapons.
